Package ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameBoardView
    GameBoardView is used to create a graphic interface where the user can see what's actually going on in the city
    IconFactory
    A Tile's or tool"s icon name is based on its class name and it's surroundings.
    Impot
    Impot (french for taxes) is a class bound to the cityhall and other resources, it uses the values chosen in the GestionImpot display to set them to the actual values in game
    MessagesView
    MessageView meant to be used in the event log to display wich random event or issues happened during the game
    PropertiesView
    PropertiesView is meant to help the player by giving him the status of different resources like population and such
    RefreshView
    RefreshView is a class meant to handle the timer refresh
    TileUI
    TileUI allows the display of the different icons for tiles
    ToolsView
    enable a view of the tools for the player
    ToolUI
